content.html: one of the funniest bugs in history: facebook used to have a feature where you could type in anyone’s name to see how your own profile looked to them, to help you set your privacy settings. but if you typed in a fb employee, you’d see unreleased features (just like they would!)
content.value:
one of the funniest bugs in history: facebook used to have a feature where you could type in anyone’s name to see how your own profile looked to them, to help you set your privacy settings.

but if you typed in a fb employee, you’d see unreleased features (just like they would!)
